description:
After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Save Me, Hero!! My Enemy Is the Immortal Princess!
Tasukete Hero!? Teki wa Fujimi no Princess
Un héros à la rescousse ! L`ennemi est une princesse immortelle
Спаси меня, о герой!! Противник – неуязвимая принцесса
أنقذني أيّها البطل!! عدوّي هي الأميرة الخالدة
助けて英雄[ヒーロー]!? 敵は不死身のプリンセス
